str2: For. A primary particle; properly, assigning a reason.
A primary preposition denoting the channel of an act; through.
From a primary nemo; law, genitive case, specially, (including the volume); also of the Gospel), or figuratively.

parse: Personal / Possessive Pronoun - Nominative 1st Person Singular
str2: I, the first-person pronoun. A primary pronoun of the first person I.

parse: Verb - Aorist Indicative Active - 1st Person Singular
str2: To be dying, be about to die, wither, decay. From apo and thnesko; to die off.
From a primary nemo; law, genitive case, specially, (including the volume); also of the Gospel), or figuratively.
In order that, so that. Probably from the same as the former part of heautou; in order that.

parse: Verb - Aorist Subjunctive Active - 1st Person Singular
str2: To live, be alive. A primary verb; to live.
A deity, especially the supreme Divinity; figuratively, a magistrate; by Hebraism, very.
